description:
The open-source, cross-platform, and free video editor Shotcut has been updated to version 24.04, a release that enhances Ambisonic spatial (spherical) audio support and fixes …

The post Shotcut 24.04 Open-Source Video Editor Released with Ambisonic Encoder Filter appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Shotcut 24.04 Open-Source Video Editor Released with Ambisonic Encoder Filter

description:
Arch Linux-based Garuda Linux “Bird of Prey” distribution is now available for download with latest KDE Plasma 6 desktop environment and other improvements.

The post Arch Linux-Based Garuda Linux “Bird of Prey” Distro Lands with KDE Plasma 6 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Arch Linux-Based Garuda Linux “Bird of Prey” Distro Lands with KDE Plasma 6
